Alert.AskTimeout: Cannot download data, server timeout ! Do you want to repeat request ?
Alert.AskUploadTimeout: Cannot upload data, server timeout ! Do you want to send data again ?
Alert.ErrHide: You cannot hide all variable columns!
Alert.ErrHideExt: Width of all fixed columns is too wide!
Alert.ErrPrintOpen:
The print window could not be opened
Permit popup windows to let print the grid
Alert.ErrPrint: The document was not successfully printed
Alert.ErrCheck: Synchronizing with server failed! Do you want to temporary disable the checking for updates?
Alert.SearchHelp:
Enter string to search for like in Google
individual keywords separate by space phrases place into double quotes variants separate by uppercase OR keyword exceptions precede by "-" (minus)
Or enter expression to search by
specify columns caption to compare use operators < <= > >= = <> ( ) + - * / use AND OR keywords to join expressions use special keywords STARTS ENDS CONTAINS for comparing strings (NOT to negate) example: customer starts martin and date <= 1/1/2006
Alert.SearchStart: Nothing found Do you want to continue from beginning?
Alert.DelRow: Are you sure to delete row '%d' ?
Alert.DelSelected: Are you sure to delete %d selected rows ?
Alert.PrintReady: Grid is ready to print Choose Print Preview option in menu to update page size Or choose Print option or press Ctrl+P to print directly
Alert.PrintCloseWindow: After print is finished, you can close this page
Alert.PrintCloseTag: After print is finished, you can click to the grid to return
Alert.PivotReload: Do you want to re-create the pivot grid?
Alert.FormulaCircularAsk: Formula contains circular cell reference Do you want to permit it?
Alert.DelCol: Are you sure to delete column '%d' ?
Alert.DelSelectedCols: Are you sure to delete %d selected columns ?
Alert.SearchEnd: Nothing found Do you want to continue from end?
Alert.ExportIE: Not available in IE 9 and older
Alert.LoadSheetErrorMissingModule: Loading data failed because of missing TreeGrid module %1
Alert.StripHtml: The change will strip formatting from the text! Do you want to save the change?

Text.GroupCustom: To group by, drag column caption here ...
Text.Print: Please wait while generating report for printing ...
Text.Printed: Please switch to window containing the report to print it

Text.FormulaError5: Formula cannot be calculated with error %2
Text.NotInList: The value %1 is not in the item list
Text.NoNumber: Cell value is not a number
Text.SizeChanged: The value %1 changed due size limit
Text.ErrAdd: Cannot add new row to parent %1
Text.ErrAddRoot: Cannot add new row to root
Text.SetStyleError: No cell was changed due edit restrictions
Text.SetStyleErrors: There were not changed %1 cells due edit restrictions
Text.DiscardSheet: Do you want to discard all your data and load the data from file %1?
Text.AddSheet: Do you want to add the data from file %1 to actual data?
Text.OpenSheet:
Do you want to add the data from file %1 to actual data
or discard all your data and load the data from file %1?
Text.LoadSheetError: Loading data from %1 failed with error %2
Text.SheetsUnsupported: Opening xlsx files is not supported in your browser
Text.OnlyXlsx: Cannot open %1. Only xlsx files are supported
Text.ShrinkStyle: Too large style, shrinking style size

There is not enough space to display the grid fully
Do you want to shrink the grid style size?
Text.EnterFormat: Enter format string like in MS Excel

Text.FormulaError10: Not supported reference to external file %2 in formula %1
Text.FormulaError11: Not yet implemented array formula or unexpected cell range %2 in formula %1

MenuCfg.Caption: TreeGrid settings
MenuCfg.CheckUpdates: Check for updates on server every
MenuCfg.GanttCorrectDependenciesFixed: Auto schedule also the changed task
MenuCfg.GanttBaseProof: Can move objects before project start
MenuCfg.GanttBasePreferred: Project start is preferred to constraints
MenuCfg.GanttErrSlack: Minimal slack bound for error task
MenuCfg.GanttFinishProof: Can move objects after project finish
MenuCfg.GanttFinishPreferred: Project finish is preferred to constraints

MenuPrint.Caption: Print options
MenuPrint.PrintPageRoot: Start page always by root row

Format.r: ddd MMM d HH:mm:ss UTCzzzzz yyyy
Format.R: ddd MMM d HH:mm:ss UTCzzzzz yyyy

Toolbar.ExportTip: Export grid data to your spreadsheet program
Toolbar.ImportTip: Open local MS Excel xlsx or csv file in the grid
Toolbar.AddTip: Add new row or move or copy selected rows
Toolbar.AddChildTip: Add new child row or move or copy selected rows to actual cursor position
Toolbar.AddColTip: Add new column or move or copy selected columns
Toolbar.OutdentTip: Outdent, move focused row below its parent
Toolbar.IndentTip: Indent, move focused row as child of the row above
Toolbar.TextIndentTip: Indent cell value from the align edge
Toolbar.RotateLeftTip: Rotate the cell content 270 degrees clockwise
Toolbar.RotateRightTip: Rotate the cell content 90 degrees clockwise
Toolbar.SortTip: Enable sorting and re-sort rows now
Toolbar.SortTip1: Disable sorting to change sort criteria faster
Toolbar.CalcTip: Enable calculations and re-calculate grid now
Toolbar.CalcTip1: Disable calculations to edit cell values faster
Toolbar.ColumnsTip: Displays menu to choose visible columns

D.Name: Panel
